text: The Sherbrooke Phoenix are a Canadian ice hockey team. They began playing in 2012. The team currently plays in the Quebec Maritime Junior Hockey League. They play their home games in Sherbrooke, Quebec at the Palais des Sports LÃ©opold-Drolet. The team was created when the Lewiston Maineiacs folded and the team was relocated to Sherbrooke. Sherbrooke used to have two other QMJHL teams in the past but they relocated. One of their old teams was relocated to Lewiston, Maine in 2003. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Canadian Hockey League teams Category:Ice hockey teams in Quebec Category:Quebec Major Junior Hockey League Category:2012 establishments in Canada
title: Sherbrooke Phoenix
